backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining product management system with types for products, filters, opportunity scoring, and user profiles; includes mixins for storage and authorization, and maps for products and user profiles with query/update functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four debugging and data extraction features for ProductGrid.tsx and useQueries.ts, all with high confidence and linked to test requirements REQ-64, REQ-65, REQ-67.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including routing, layout, filters, product display, analytics tools, and UI elements with their key responsibilities and data flows.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements, charts, sidebar, and semantic tokens using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags for the Amazon India Seller Opportunity Finder application, loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for dashboard and competitor analysis, wrapped in ThemeProvider, ErrorBoundary, and Toaster for notifications.
Advanced filtering panel component managing local filter state with numeric inputs stored as strings, providing apply/reset functionality and sanitizing values before propagating changes to parent.
frontend/src/components/AlertHistory.tsx: Scrollable alert history list component displaying alerts with type-specific icons, read/unread status badges, and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/AlertNotificatio: Displays a bell icon button with unread count badge that opens a sheet containing alert history. Uses mock alert data for opportunities and competition changes.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: Renders a card with category filter buttons including an "All Categories" option and individual category buttons with icons. Highlights the currently selected category.
Displays a static heatmap image showing opportunity distribution across categories with a gradient overlay and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/CompetitorCard.t: Shows competitor details including rank, seller name, price, rating, reviews, listing quality score, and detected weaknesses in a card layout.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches errors, displays a user-friendly error message with recovery options, and shows technical details in development mode.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with copyright notice and a "Built with caffeine.ai" attribution link with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main header component with logo, theme toggle, subscription tier badge, and login/logout button. Handles Internet Identity authentication and navigation.
Keyword research tool with search input that displays mock data including search volume, difficulty score, CPC estimate, trend chart, and long-tail keyword suggestions.
frontend/src/components/KeywordTrendChar: Renders a 12-month line chart using Recharts to visualize keyword search volume trends over time.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper with header, footer, alert notifications, and profile setup modal. Conditionally shows profile setup for authenticated users without profiles.
frontend/src/components/LoadingStates.ts: Displays a grid of skeleton loading cards (6 items) with placeholder content for product listings during data fetching.
frontend/src/components/OpportunityLeade: Shows top 10 products sorted by margin in a scrollable leaderboard format with rank, title, category, price, and margin percentage.
frontend/src/components/OpportunityScore: Displays a visual progress meter for product opportunity scores (0-100) with color-coded indicators (green/yellow/red) based on score thresholds.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Renders a card displaying product details including image, price, sales estimates, revenue, margin, rating, competition level, opportunity score meter, and recommendation badge with navigation to product details.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Main grid component that fetches and displays products using filters, includes TEST_MODE for mock data, handles loading/error states, and shows filter reset controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductSortContr: Provides a dropdown select control for sorting products by score, revenue, competition, or growth.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for new users to set up their profile with name and email, creating a free-tier subscription on submission.
frontend/src/components/ProfitCalculator: Two-panel calculator component with input form for selling price, cost, weight, and ads budget, displaying detailed profit breakdown including Amazon fees and net profit.
frontend/src/components/RecommendationBa: Displays a colored badge with icon indicating product recommendation status (YES/AVOID/MODERATE).
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionTier: Renders a badge showing user subscription tier (Free/Pro/Premium) with corresponding icon and styling.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button component that toggles between light and dark themes with animated sun/moon icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handles anonymous/authenticated states, and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductFilters.ts: Custom hook managing product filter state (category, price, BSR, revenue, ratings, etc.) with session storage persistence and helper functions to convert filters to backend-compatible format.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for product search, fetching individual products, and mutations, with fallback mock data and proper BigInt/type handling for backend communication.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors, including primary, secondary, muted, destructive, and chart color definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitorAnalysis.ts: Page displaying competitor analysis for a specific product, showing top 10 sellers with mock data including pricing, ratings, reviews, and listing quality metrics.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page combining category filters, advanced filters, and product grid to display Amazon India product opportunities.
frontend/src/types/categories.ts: Defines product categories array with names and associated Lucide icons for Electronics, Home & Kitchen, Fashion, Sports, and other Amazon categories.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency (INR), numbers (with K/L/Cr abbreviations), and dates using Intl API.
frontend/src/utils/profitCalculations.ts: Calculates Amazon seller profit metrics including referral fees, FBA fees, GST, shipping, packaging costs, net profit, ROI, and break-even ACOS.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens for a component-based UI system.
project_state.json: Project metadata for an Amazon India Seller Opportunity Finder application, documenting architecture (React/Node.js/PostgreSQL stack), existing features (filtering, profit calculation, competitor analysis), and a known issue where ProductGrid displays no products despite resolved serialization errors.
